cars.name: GR Corolla
cars.description: The 2023 GR Corolla is Toyota's high-performance hatchback, built for driving enthusiasts. Featuring a turbocharged 1.6L 3-cylinder engine, it delivers 300 horsepower and 273 lb-ft of torque, making it a force on both the street and track.

cars.name: GR Yaris
cars.description: The GR Yaris, a rally-bred hatchback, combines lightweight design with impressive performance. Powered by a 1.6L 3-cylinder turbo engine, it achieves 257 horsepower and features a sophisticated all-wheel-drive system for superior handling.

cars.name: GR Supra
cars.description: The 2023 GR Supra is Toyota's return to the iconic sports coupe market. With a powerful 3.0L turbocharged inline-6 engine, it delivers 382 horsepower, making it a thrilling drive on both the street and track. The car's sleek design and performance capabilities have been honed for precision handling and exhilarating acceleration.

cars.name: Supra A80
cars.description: The 1996 Supra A80, often regarded as one of the best Japanese sports cars of its time, is a legend in the automotive world. Featuring a turbocharged 3.0L inline-six engine, this car is known for its tunability and legendary status in street racing culture.

cars.name: Celica GT
cars.description: The 1996 Toyota Celica GT is a compact, sporty coupe that offers a balance between performance and everyday usability. Powered by a 2.2L 4-cylinder engine, it provides a great entry point for those seeking an affordable sports car with impressive handling.

cars.name: AE 86
cars.description: The AE 86, known for its lightweight design and agile handling, became a cult classic thanks to its appearance in motorsports and drift culture. Its 1.6L 4-cylinder engine and rear-wheel drive setup offer the perfect foundation for enthusiasts seeking to modify or race their car.

cars.name: FT 86
cars.description: The 2014 Toyota FT 86, also known as the Scion FR-S in the U.S., is a lightweight, rear-wheel-drive coupe aimed at providing an engaging driving experience. With a 2.0L 4-cylinder engine, it strikes a balance between performance and affordability for driving purists.

cars.name: GR 86
cars.description: The 2024 Toyota GR 86 brings a refreshed and modern look to the beloved sports coupe. With its 2.4L Boxer engine, it delivers 228 horsepower and a low center of gravity that makes it an incredibly agile and fun-to-drive car for enthusiasts.

cars.name: Land Cruiser GR Sport
cars.description: The 2023 Toyota Land Cruiser GR Sport is an off-road powerhouse, combining luxury and rugged capability. With a 3.5L turbocharged V6 engine and advanced off-road features, it’s built to tackle any terrain while providing premium comfort and technology.

cars.name: Civic Type-R FL5
cars.description: The 2024 Honda Civic Type-R FL5 offers a refined driving experience with a turbocharged 2.0L engine that delivers 320 horsepower. The car is renowned for its precise handling and aggressive design, making it an ideal choice for enthusiasts who crave both performance and practicality.

cars.name: Civic Type-R FK8
cars.description: The 2020 Civic Type-R FK8 continues the legacy of the Type-R lineup, featuring a 2.0L turbocharged engine that offers incredible performance. With its sharp handling and aggressive styling, this version of the Type-R is built for those who want a car that's both thrilling on track and practical on the road.

cars.name: Civic Type-R EK9
cars.description: The 2000 Honda Civic Type-R EK9 is a lightweight and high-performance version of the Civic. Known for its agility and precision, it comes with a 1.6L engine that revs high and delivers excellent power for its size. A true icon in the hot hatchback world.

cars.name: Civic Type-R FD2
cars.description: The 2007 Civic Type-R FD2 is a sedan variant of the iconic Civic Type-R. With a 2.0L engine that pushes out 221 hp, it blends performance and practicality in a way that few cars in its class can match.

cars.name: Integra Type-R
cars.description: The 2001 Integra Type-R is a performance-oriented coupe that delivers an exhilarating driving experience. With a high-revving 1.8L engine producing 195 hp, it was built for enthusiasts who prioritize handling and precision.

cars.name: NSX-R NA1
cars.description: The 1992 NSX-R NA1 is a legendary Japanese supercar that blends sports car performance with luxury. Powered by a 3.0L V6 engine, it provides exceptional performance with 280 hp and exceptional handling.

cars.name: NSX-R NA2
cars.description: The 2004 NSX-R NA2 is the second iteration of the iconic NSX series, featuring updated technology and a 3.2L V6 engine. With 290 hp and a lightweight design, it delivers pure performance and handling.

cars.name: S2000 Type-S
cars.description: The 2008 Honda S2000 Type-S is a roadster known for its high-revving 2.2L engine and exceptional handling. It offers a true sports car experience with a well-balanced chassis and a 6-speed manual transmission.

cars.name: S660
cars.description: The 2015 Honda S660 is a small, lightweight sports car that provides a fun, agile driving experience. With a 0.66L turbocharged engine, it's perfect for those seeking a compact and responsive car.

cars.name: RX-7 FD3S
cars.description: The 2001 RX-7 FD3S is one of Mazda's most iconic sports cars, powered by a twin-rotor 1.3L rotary engine. It is known for its lightweight construction and near-perfect handling, making it a joy to drive.

cars.name: RX-7 FC3S
cars.description: The 1985 RX-7 FC3S marks the second generation of Mazda's RX series. Equipped with a 1.3L rotary engine, the FC3S was built for performance enthusiasts with its sharp handling and strong acceleration.

cars.name: Miata MX-5
cars.description: The 1989 Mazda MX-5 Miata is the original small roadster that redefined affordable sports cars. It combines an ultra-light body with responsive handling, making it an exceptional choice for driving enthusiasts who value agility and fun over outright power.

cars.name: MX-5
cars.description: The 2017 Mazda MX-5 Miata is a modern take on the iconic roadster. With its lightweight design, precise handling, and 2.0L engine, it brings a fresh and exhilarating driving experience while maintaining the Miata's core values of simplicity and driving purity.

cars.name: GT-R R35
cars.description: The 2020 Nissan GT-R R-35 is an iconic supercar known for its aggressive design and powerhouse performance. Powered by a twin-turbo V6 engine, it offers remarkable acceleration and handling, making it one of the most capable and affordable supercars in its class.

cars.name: GT-R R35 Nismo Edition
cars.description: The 2023 Nissan GT-R R-35 Nismo Edition elevates the legendary GT-R to a new level of performance, with enhanced aerodynamics, a refined suspension system, and additional power from its tuned twin-turbo V6 engine, making it the ultimate expression of Nissan's engineering excellence.

cars.name: GT-R R34 V-Spec
cars.description: The 2000 Nissan Skyline GT-R R34 V-Spec is a legendary Japanese performance car that earned its reputation on the track and the street. With its tuned RB26DETT engine and all-wheel drive system, the R-34 was a true icon in the world of high-performance cars.

cars.name: GT-R R34 Nismo
cars.description: The 2000 Nissan GT-R R34 Nismo is the tuned, race-ready version of the iconic Skyline GT-R, developed by Nissan's motorsport division. With extensive modifications to the engine, suspension, and bodywork, the R-34 Nismo was designed for ultimate performance on both the track and road.

cars.name: GT-R R33
cars.description: The 1995 Nissan GT-R R33 is often regarded as one of the most refined and balanced versions of the Skyline GT-R. Featuring a more stable chassis and improved aerodynamics, it offered impressive handling and power, making it a favorite among driving enthusiasts.

cars.name: GT-R R32
cars.description: The 1989 Nissan GT-R R-32, also known as the 'Godzilla', is the car that started the GT-R legend. With its 2.6L twin-turbocharged engine and cutting-edge ATTESA AWD system, the R-32 was ahead of its time and set the benchmark for Japanese performance cars.

cars.name: Z Nismo
cars.description: The 2024 Nissan Z Nismo combines the rich heritage of the Z series with modern performance upgrades. With its more powerful engine and improved handling capabilities, the Z Nismo offers an exhilarating driving experience, embodying the spirit of its predecessors with a contemporary twist.

cars.name: 370Z
cars.description: The 2020 Nissan 370Z is a continuation of the iconic Z lineage, offering an engaging driving experience with a proven 3.7L V6 engine. With its low weight and rear-wheel drive, it offers precise handling and an affordable performance package for enthusiasts.

cars.name: Silvia S15
cars.description: The 1999 Nissan Silvia S15 is a beloved Japanese sports coupe, known for its agile handling and turbocharged engine. It's a fan-favorite among drifting enthusiasts and tuners, offering a great balance of performance and style.

cars.name: NSX Type-S
cars.description: The 2022 Acura NSX Type-S is the most performance-focused version of the brand's iconic hybrid supercar. With a twin-turbo V6 and three electric motors, it delivers a balance of power, agility, and technological sophistication. The Type-S edition enhances performance and driving dynamics, making it a thrilling experience for enthusiasts.

cars.name: Integra Type-S
cars.description: The 2024 Acura Integra Type-S is a high-performance version of the iconic Integra hatchback. With a turbocharged 4-cylinder engine and a precise 6-speed manual transmission, it combines agility, style, and driving enjoyment for enthusiasts seeking a pure performance car with modern tech.

cars.name: Huracan EVO
cars.description: The 2019 Lamborghini Huracán EVO is an exceptional supercar that redefines driving performance. Powered by a 5.2L V10 engine, it delivers outstanding speed and agility, enhanced by advanced aerodynamics and the Lamborghini Dinamica Veicolo Integrata (LDVI) system for ultimate driving precision.

cars.name: Huracan EVO RWD
cars.description: The 2021 Lamborghini Huracán EVO RWD is the rear-wheel-drive version of the Huracán EVO, offering a more engaging and raw driving experience. With its naturally aspirated V10 engine, it delivers blistering acceleration and precise handling, designed for purists seeking excitement on the road.

cars.name: Huracan STO
cars.description: The 2022 Lamborghini Huracán STO is a track-focused supercar that brings Lamborghini's racing heritage to the road. With lightweight construction, enhanced aerodynamics, and a powerful V10 engine, the STO is designed for precision and performance, delivering an unforgettable driving experience.

cars.name: Huracan Technica
cars.description: The 2023 Lamborghini Huracán Technica brings advanced technology and performance to the forefront. Designed for high-performance driving, it combines the power of the V10 engine with cutting-edge handling systems, ensuring an exhilarating experience whether on the road or the track.

cars.name: Aventador S
cars.description: The 2017 Lamborghini Aventador S is a stunning supercar that blends breathtaking performance with aggressive styling. Its naturally aspirated V12 engine provides monstrous power and acceleration, complemented by dynamic steering and rear-wheel-drive dynamics for unmatched excitement behind the wheel.

cars.name: Aventador SVJ
cars.description: The 2019 Lamborghini Aventador SVJ is a race-bred masterpiece that pushes the boundaries of performance and design. With a powerful V12 engine, lightweight construction, and active aerodynamics, the SVJ offers extreme handling and a mind-blowing driving experience.

cars.name: Aventador Ultimae
cars.description: The 2022 Lamborghini Aventador Ultimae is the final iteration of the Aventador series, combining all the performance upgrades of the SVJ with the refinement of the base Aventador. It’s a limited-edition model that showcases Lamborghini's best technology and performance.

cars.name: Reveulto
cars.description: The 2024 Lamborghini Reveulto is a groundbreaking hybrid supercar that integrates cutting-edge hybrid technology with Lamborghini's iconic V12 engine. It offers an electrifying performance, futuristic design, and unrivaled driving dynamics.

cars.name: Temerario
cars.description: The 2025 Lamborghini Temerario is a highly anticipated hypercar with revolutionary performance capabilities, but detailed specifications are currently undisclosed.

cars.name: Urus
cars.description: The Lamborghini Urus is a luxury SUV combining the performance of a supercar with the utility of an off-roader. Its 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine produces 650 hp and achieves 0-100 km/h in 3.6 seconds.

cars.name: Urus Performante
cars.description: The Urus Performante takes performance to the next level with a more powerful 4.0L V8 engine producing 657 hp. Enhanced aerodynamics and lightweight design allow it to hit 100 km/h in just 3.3 seconds.

cars.name: Urus SE
cars.description: The 2025 Urus SE is an upcoming variant of the Urus, designed with refined luxury and superior performance. It promises advanced hybrid technology with enhanced driving dynamics.

cars.name: Urus S
cars.description: The Urus S delivers an unmatched blend of comfort and performance. With 666 hp from its 4.0L twin-turbo V8, it accelerates from 0-100 km/h in 3.5 seconds, all while maintaining luxury SUV comfort.

cars.name: Mustang GT
cars.description: The 2018 Ford Mustang GT offers thrilling performance with its 5.0L V8 engine, delivering a balance of raw power and modern features for driving enthusiasts.

cars.name: Mustang Shelby GT350
cars.description: The Shelby GT350 is a track-ready Mustang featuring a naturally aspirated 5.2L V8, precise handling, and aggressive styling.

cars.name: Mustang Shelby GT500
cars.description: The Shelby GT500 is the most powerful Mustang, boasting a supercharged 5.2L V8 engine and advanced aerodynamics for unparalleled performance.

cars.name: Mustang Dark Horse
cars.description: The 2024 Mustang Dark Horse is a performance-oriented variant featuring enhanced dynamics and a specially tuned 5.0L V8.

cars.name: Mustang Mach-1
cars.description: The 2021 Mustang Mach-1 bridges the gap between performance and heritage, offering a tuned 5.0L V8 and track-focused upgrades.

cars.name: 296 GTB
cars.description: The Ferrari 296 GTB is a mid-engine hybrid supercar that combines a V6 engine with an electric motor for thrilling performance and enhanced efficiency.

cars.name: SF90 Stradale
cars.description: The Ferrari SF90 Stradale is the brand's first plug-in hybrid, offering unmatched performance with its V8 engine and three electric motors.

specifications.engine: 4.0L Twin-Turbo V8 with Three Electric Motors

cars.name: Purosangue
cars.description: The Ferrari Purosangue is Ferrari's first SUV, combining practicality with a naturally aspirated V12 engine and unmistakable performance.

cars.name: 812 Superfast
cars.description: The Ferrari 812 Superfast is a front-engined V12 supercar, known for its exceptional power and timeless Ferrari design.

cars.name: Roma
cars.description: The Ferrari Roma is a sleek and elegant coupe with a focus on luxury and grand touring, powered by a responsive V8 engine.

cars.name: 911 Carrera GTS (992.1)
cars.description: The Porsche 911 Carrera GTS (992.1) offers a blend of powerful performance and refined luxury, ideal for any enthusiast.

cars.name: 911 Turbo S (992.1)
cars.description: The Porsche 911 Turbo S (992.1) is a high-performance variant with stunning acceleration and exceptional handling.

cars.name: 911 Carrera GTS (992.2)
cars.description: The Porsche 911 Carrera GTS (992.2) brings performance and luxury to the next level with an upgraded engine and sharper handling.

cars.name: 911 GT3 (992.1)
cars.description: The Porsche 911 GT3 (992.1) is engineered for pure performance on the track, featuring a naturally aspirated engine for unmatched driving pleasure.

cars.name: 911 GT3 (992.2)
cars.description: The Porsche 911 GT3 (992.2) brings improvements in aerodynamics and handling, refining the ultimate driving experience.

cars.name: 911 GT3RS (992.1)
cars.description: The Porsche 911 GT3RS (992.1) is the pinnacle of track-focused performance, offering exceptional power and track handling.

cars.name: 911 GT3RS MANTHEY (992.2)
cars.description: The Porsche 911 GT3RS Manthey (992.2) takes the GT3RS to the next level, providing additional track enhancements and performance.

cars.name: 718 Cayman GTS
cars.description: The Porsche 718 Cayman GTS offers a perfect blend of sportiness and everyday usability with an agile handling package.

cars.name: 718 Cayman GT4
cars.description: The Porsche 718 Cayman GT4 is a performance-oriented sports car with track-ready performance and handling.

cars.name: 718 Cayman GT4RS
cars.description: The Porsche 718 Cayman GT4RS pushes the boundaries of track performance with a focus on speed, precision, and agility.

cars.name: 718 Spyder RS
cars.description: The Porsche 718 Spyder RS is the ultimate open-top sports car, offering a blend of exceptional performance and driving pleasure.

cars.name: Cayenne GTS
cars.description: The Porsche Cayenne GTS is a high-performance SUV with a powerful engine and a focus on sporty handling, offering both practicality and speed.

cars.name: Panamera Turbo S E-Hybrid
cars.description: The Porsche Panamera Turbo S E-Hybrid offers incredible performance paired with hybrid efficiency, ideal for those seeking a luxurious yet eco-conscious ride.

cars.name: Macan GTS
cars.description: The Porsche Macan GTS is a sport-oriented SUV that blends performance with practicality, featuring a turbocharged engine and sharp handling.

cars.name: Macan Turbo
cars.description: The Macan Turbo combines powerful performance and off-road capability with a refined driving experience and luxury features.

cars.name: Taycan Turbo
cars.description: The Porsche Taycan Turbo is a performance electric vehicle that blends Porsche's iconic driving dynamics with cutting-edge electric technology.

cars.name: Taycan Turbo S Cross Turismo
cars.description: The Taycan Turbo S Cross Turismo is the ultimate combination of electric performance and all-terrain capability, offering a unique Porsche experience.

cars.name: Taycan Turbo Cross Turismo
cars.description: The Taycan Turbo Cross Turismo offers excellent electric performance with more utility and off-road capability for adventurous drivers.

cars.name: Taycan Turbo GT
cars.description: The Taycan Turbo GT offers the ultimate in electric performance, delivering the fastest acceleration and track-focused capabilities.

cars.name: Cayenne Turbo GT
cars.description: The Porsche Cayenne Turbo GT is a high-performance SUV that combines track-level dynamics with everyday practicality, powered by a robust turbocharged V8 engine.

cars.name: M240i
cars.description: The M240i combines everyday usability with the power of a 6-cylinder engine for an exhilarating drive.

cars.name: M2 23
cars.description: The M2 offers dynamic handling with a focus on precision and agility for driving enthusiasts.

cars.name: M2 25

cars.name: M3 Competition

cars.name: M3 CS

cars.name: M5 Touring

cars.name: X3 M Competition

cars.name: X5 M Competition

cars.name: X6 M Competition

cars.name: M8 Competition Convertible

cars.name: i4 M50

cars.name: i7 M70 xDrive
cars.description: The i7 M70 xDrive is an all-electric luxury sedan that redefines driving with its high-end technology and performance.

cars.name: iX M60
cars.description: The iX M60 offers impressive electric performance with the agility and handling expected from an M model.

cars.name: M760e xDrive
cars.description: The M760e xDrive combines ultra-luxury with electrified performance, offering a hybrid powertrain for smooth acceleration.

cars.name: XM

cars.name: i5 M60 xDrive
cars.description: The i5 M60 xDrive offers high-end electric performance, combining BMW's luxury with the power of a full electric powertrain.

cars.name: C43
cars.description: The Mercedes-Benz C43 is a performance-oriented coupe with refined luxury and dynamic driving features.

cars.name: CLE 53

cars.name: CLS 53

cars.name: C63
cars.description: The C63 is a potent coupe blending aggressive power with luxury features, ideal for driving enthusiasts.

cars.name: A45
cars.description: The A45 is a compact luxury coupe offering aggressive styling and an efficient, powerful engine.

cars.name: CLA 45
cars.description: The CLA 45 combines sleek looks with incredible acceleration and handling, perfect for performance-minded drivers.

cars.name: G63
cars.description: The G63 is a rugged yet luxurious SUV with a powerful V8 engine and unparalleled off-road capability.

cars.name: GLC 63
cars.description: The GLC43 Coupe combines dynamic styling with powerful performance in a sporty SUV package.

cars.name: GLE 53
cars.description: The GLC53 is a performance-oriented luxury SUV with stunning acceleration and superior comfort.

cars.name: SL 63
cars.description: The SL63 is a convertible roadster that combines exceptional performance with open-air freedom.

cars.name: R8
cars.description: The Audi R8 is a high-performance supercar known for its striking design, potent V10 engine, and dynamic handling.

cars.name: RS3
cars.description: The Audi RS3 is a compact luxury sedan that combines cutting-edge technology with blistering performance.

cars.name: RS4 Avant
cars.description: The Audi RS4 Avant is a powerful wagon offering a perfect balance of utility and high-performance dynamics.

cars.name: RS5
cars.description: The Audi RS5 Coupe offers exceptional handling, aggressive styling, and a twin-turbo V6 engine.

cars.name: RS6 Avant
cars.description: The RS6 Avant blends thrilling performance with practicality, offering a versatile wagon with sports car-level performance.

cars.name: RS7
cars.description: The Audi RS7 is a performance-focused luxury sedan with a muscular twin-turbo V8 engine and superior handling.

cars.name: RS Q8
cars.description: The Audi RS Q8 is a high-performance luxury SUV with sharp handling and a bold design.

cars.name: RS e-tron GT
cars.description: The Audi RS e-tron GT is an all-Electric that offers thrilling performance and cutting-edge technology.

cars.name: Model 3
cars.description: The Tesla Model 3 is a compact Electric offering impressive range, modern technology, and incredible acceleration.

cars.name: Model Y
cars.description: The Tesla Model Y is a compact electric SUV offering great utility, performance, and Tesla's advanced driver assistance features.

cars.name: Cybertruck
cars.description: The Tesla Cybertruck is an all-electric pickup truck that combines rugged design with Tesla’s futuristic technology.

cars.name: WRX 2023
cars.description: The Subaru WRX offers a dynamic driving experience with its rally-inspired design and performance-oriented features.

cars.name: WRX STi 2023
cars.description: The WRX STI is the high-performance variant of the WRX, delivering extreme handling and power, built for driving enthusiasts.

cars.name: BRZ 2023
cars.description: The Subaru BRZ is a lightweight, rear-wheel-drive sports coupe designed for enthusiasts who appreciate pure driving dynamics.

cars.name: WRX 2010
cars.description: The 2010 Subaru WRX offers great all-weather performance with its turbocharged engine and all-wheel drive, perfect for those who love spirited driving.

cars.name: WRX STi 2010
cars.description: The 2010 WRX STI is the ultimate in performance, featuring a more powerful turbocharged engine and upgraded handling.

cars.name: Impreza WRX
cars.description: The 2007 Subaru Impreza WRX is known for its rally-inspired design and performance, offering a thrilling drive on both city streets and dirt tracks.

cars.name: Impreza WRX STi
cars.description: The 2007 WRX STI is a high-performance model designed for serious enthusiasts, offering extreme handling and power.

cars.name: BRZ 2013
cars.description: The 2013 Subaru BRZ offers exceptional handling and a balanced, rear-wheel-drive layout, making it a pure enthusiast's car.
